data.message: Facebook I can't log into my account. I have an account that is 8 years old with 8 years of pictures, memories, videos, etc under the name "Bobby Treacherous" you asked to send my id. I sent it and I haven't been able to log in since

replies.message: Hi Robert. Facebook is a community where people use their authentic identities. We require everyone to provide the first and last names they use in everyday life so that you always know who you're connecting with. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2e7cbr4. -Brittany
I understand the new rules. How can I get that account activated again?
Hey Robert. Have you tried filling out the name change form? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2e7hLd0. -Brittany
I just clicked on that form,however since I am logged in under this account, there is no way for me to reference the other account.

Kathyleen Sherrod  I have been blocked from making comments. Why do they even have a comment section,if you can not use it but only the number of times Face Book  think is acceptable? What about people reporting you on spam and you are innocent. That they just do not like your political comments.They need to check your comments and get on the ones that lied on you. if you are innocent.
